about_the_game:
This pack unlocks 36 new furniture items to craft in Industrial and Brutalist styles

Industrial Furniture Set:


18 pieces including Display Cabinets, Lamps, Candlesticks and more, crafted on the Decorations Bench at level 10 (materials including iron ingots and steel screws)

  • 4 Dining Room Furniture Pieces
  • 7 Lounge Furniture Pieces
  • 7 Bedroom Furniture Pieces

Brutalist Furniture Set:


18 pieces including an Octagonal Table, Bookshelves, Couches and more, crafted on the Decorations bench at level 20 (materials including iron ingots, steel screws and concrete)

  • 4 Brutalist Dining Room Furniture Pieces
  • 8 Brutalist Lounge Furniture Pieces
  • 6 Brutalist Bedroom Furniture Pieces
detailed_description:
THIS SUPPORTS OUR PROJECT

Our DLC was made to provide a way for those who enjoy the project to further support it, and in return receive some simple new content. This content is not essential for the game. Consider purchasing this if you want to further provide financial support to the development of Icarus.


About the Game

This pack unlocks 36 new furniture items to craft in Industrial and Brutalist styles

Industrial Furniture Set:


18 pieces including Display Cabinets, Lamps, Candlesticks and more, crafted on the Decorations Bench at level 10 (materials including iron ingots and steel screws)

  • 4 Dining Room Furniture Pieces
  • 7 Lounge Furniture Pieces
  • 7 Bedroom Furniture Pieces

Brutalist Furniture Set:


18 pieces including an Octagonal Table, Bookshelves, Couches and more, crafted on the Decorations bench at level 20 (materials including iron ingots, steel screws and concrete)

  • 4 Brutalist Dining Room Furniture Pieces
  • 8 Brutalist Lounge Furniture Pieces
  • 6 Brutalist Bedroom Furniture Pieces
name: Icarus: Industrial Furniture Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Decorate your base with our Industrial furniture pack. Featuring a range of new furniture and decorations to bring an industrial aesthetic to the base of your dreams. Support our continued development and add some functional styling to your home.
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Spanish - Latin America, Japanese, Korean, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
